messages.body: $AAPL https://www.zdnet.com/article/iphone-xs-xs-max-charging-problems-strange-issues-surface-on-apples-new-phones/

links.title: iPhone XS, XS Max charging problems: Strange issues surface on Apple's new phones | ZDNet
links.description: Some owners of the new iPhone XS and iPhone XS Max are reporting on Apple's community site that the devices aren't charging when plugged into a power supply via a Lightning cable. Certain users are reporting that the iPhone XS will sometimes start to charge after reinserting an Apple-made cable.

links.description: Apple's iPhone and iOS operating system are known for their quality, security, and integration abilities. Apple has a competitive advantage because of its sheer size and ability to vertically integrate.

$AAPL $MSFT There'll be 'blood on the streets' until China and the US reach trade deal, Mark Mobius says https://www.cnbc.com/2018/10/02/therell-be-blood-on-the-streets-until-china-and-the-us-reach-trade-deal-mark-mobius-says.html $NVDA

links.title: There'll be 'blood on the streets' until China and the US reach trade deal, Mark Mobius says
links.description: Expect much confrontation between China and the United States until they reach an agreement on trade, noted investor Mark Mobius told CNBC on Tuesday. "(China is) going to be tough to begin with and they are not going to give in easily, because you're talking about (a $)300 million trade deficit in China's favor, so they are not going to give up that easily," the founding partner at Mobius Capital Partners told CNBC's "Squawk Box Europe."

links.title: In Another Victory for Trump, Canada Agrees to a New Trade Deal
links.description: In another victory for President Trump, Canada agreed to a new trade agreement with the United States and Mexico known as the United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement (USMCA). The new trade agreement officially makes the heavily criticized NAFTA trade deal obsolete.
